pullRequest.body:
Following the removal of `structure BilinForm` from Mathlib (#11278) a number of definitions and results in `LinearAlgebra/BilinearForm/Hom` are essentially just the identity. This PR deprecates these results.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8846677842/job/24293041373)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8846677842/job/24293040442)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8846677842/job/24293041118)

Thank you for your work refactoring bilinear forms in mathlib. I see that your PR deprecated a few lemmas, but added no deprecation dates to these declarations. My understanding is that we'd like to add them, so we know when we can remove the deprecated results later. :-)
@mans0954 Do you mind adding a deprecation date to all declarations touched here, in a new PR? See my comment for how this *could* look.

> Thank you for your work refactoring bilinear forms in mathlib. I see that your PR deprecated a few lemmas, but added no deprecation dates to these declarations. My understanding is that we'd like to add them, so we know when we can remove the deprecated results later. :-)
> @mans0954 Do you mind adding a deprecation date to all declarations touched here, in a new PR? See my comment for how this _could_ look.

#12547

Here is how adding a deprecation date could look like:
```suggestion
@[deprecated] -- 2024-04-26

@grunweg there was some discussion around this [here](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Next.20steps.20for.20BilinForm) but it didn't appear to reach a definite conclusion.

Is your suggestion that the date should be the date of deprecation, or the date when the result can be deleted from Mathlib?

I would aim for the date of deprecation: a deprecation policy will imply then this can be deleted.

Fair enough; I have started [a zulip thread](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Deprecation.20policy) trying to create consensus.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(LinearAlgebra/BilinearForm/Hom): Deprecate results

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(LinearAlgebra/BilinearForm/Properties): Redefine BilinForm.IsRefl, BilinForm.IsAlt and BilinForm.IsSymm in terms of LinearMap equivalents
